channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grass not cut O/S number 48 Minetts Rd onwards., 11th October
item.description:
The grass was cut yesterday but was only done about 100 feet off Minetts Ave and workers have just stopped. Customer would like to know why this has happened and wants to know the schedule of the grass cutting and how many times the grass will get cut per year as it's very sporadic every year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Minetts Avenue, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gate is damaged/missing/locked problem, 11th October
item.description:
Email rec 09/10/2023 - Details of your enquiry: Morning, Please pass this enquiry on to the right department There are places at the Cheltenham Racecourse where gates used to be but are missing parts and cannot be kept shut, one gap has no gate that goes onto a road (spring lane) where we have chased after dogs (not our own) some going all the way down to the royal oak in the Burgage luckily lots of people where around to help We would love to buy gates to make it more safe for dogs to be off lead, please see links below of the gate placements https://maps.app.goo.gl/8C8emY4dmTK5Bh8Y6 https://maps.app.goo.gl/YTZuvwcAbfNSFbXU9 https://maps.app.goo.gl/1CXYTBNtvo59Rbbu6 As we have helped multiple dogs who have either got spooked or lost their owner, stopping them from running through, as it leads to the main road B4075 We would like the gate/s to have our business name on it and be self closing or kissing gates with no gap underneath We are local dog walkers est. 2016 and have lived in Prestbury all of our lives, mum & daughter team Let us know what you think All the best
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 11th October
item.description:
Streetlight Light is permanently out Lamp post number 2 lightbulb is not working and has not been working for months now. Resident has asked please can it be fixed.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road marking and stud issues problem, 11th October
item.description:
FMS 10.10.23 - From junction hatherly lane, road markings state centre lane is marked glos A40 and chelt, but as you emerge from lane, the lane markings guide you to the left which leads to the B4063/churchdown which caused obstruction and confusion for road users and possible collisions. road markings need to be changed so that the junction clearly states centre lane leads to B4063 and NOT chelt.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Obstruction caused by wall/building problem, 11th October
item.description:
Reporting:obstruction_caused_by_wall_or_building Entrance to Gravel Walk has been compromised by rubble left when repairs to sub station was carried out. Sign has been placed on the lane making it almost impossible to access our homes. Original sign was on the wall. Delivery drivers or contractors carrying out any repairs to our homes are unable to reach our properties. Fire and other emergency vehicles would also be affected. This is a health and safety issue.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A Sign/waymaker is misleading problem has been found, 11th October
item.description:
A Sign/waymaker is misleading problem has been found by Gloucestershire County Council, Dear Sir Can you tell me whether a footpath diversion I encountered was official? This was off Crippetts Lane having come down from Crickley Hill. At 936185 I encountered a sign saying "stags can be dangerous please use alternative path". The 6 foot high gates on the original path were locked. I worked out where it was intended I should go and discovered there were some yellow arrow footpath signs further along.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crippetts Lane, Leckhampton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 10th October
item.description:
Traffic lights Timings are incorrect With the bridge closed on Bamfurlong Lane, there is only one way out of Staverton Airport. At 5-5.00pm in Particular the timing on the lights where it meets the A4063 is crazy. It takes around 20-25 minutes to get across the junction . There is no other way out!!!
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, New Street, St Paulâ€™s, Cheltenham

item.title: Bordered up at the eastern end of the footpath, 10th October
item.description:
I have a query about Cheltenham Footpath 1. I noticed this footpath was bordered up at the eastern end of the footpath along Old Gloucester Road. It also seems inaccessible along the field boundary that runs west along adjacent allotments. On the online PROW map it does not say the path is closed, so I am wondering if it is in fact closed and what it says on the definitive map.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
